sentence: The workout room and pool were nice but were much smaller than anticipated
Staff unable unwiling to help with room problems Lousy reception Pool not in use as the staff had meetings meanting hotel guests could not use the pool in the day time
The weather was not the best but the pool area was well taken care of and relaxing
The food and drinks were amazingThe pool area was small but since it was October it was pretty empty 2 other ladies plus myself
I told him we would not have booked here if the website had not said the pool was open May to October
I was just at the pool here and it was nice but drinks were expensive and the service was not too great
Biggest complaint is the pool and amenities
Took a work assignment there at the pool
The pool needs work
We could nt even comfortably use the pool area
I liked the location right next to a big park that has botanical gardens big pool plenty of outdoor sports trails
I like the hotel very clean and elegant room was very nice pool was great
I think the bar space would be an awesome place to host pre wedding festivities like a welcome mixerI also got to go to the pool deck for a pool party absolutely adored that space as well
Sikedra and Tomy were the pool bartenders and they were absolutely amazing
I had an amazing time at this W I only came for the weekend with some friends and we partied at the pool on the 5th floor

Birthday weekend stay was greatGot an upgrade to a higher floor received a coupon for complimentary appetizer at Oceanaire restaurant the guys at the bar served me a free slice of chocolate birthday cake rooftop pool was just what we needed to enjoy that sunny Sat afternoon and we were given a later check out time on Sunday
there is a very nice pool on the 4th floor overlooking the street in front of the hotel
The pool area staff was wonderful for my grandbaby pool party she had a wonderful time her and her guests
The pool was very fun with an adult pool party going on
grab a rose and enjoy city rooftop pool area
